pr_title: DHFPROD-5380: datahubCreatedByStep is now set correctly

timeline.message: DHFPROD-5380: datahubCreatedByStep is now set correctly

timeline.bodyText: This test wasn't really testing the function, because it was passing in values - one of which was incorrect (the stepDefinitionName). I reworked the test to instead verify the interesting logic, which is that each bit is overwritten except for jobId.
timeline.author: rjrudin
